Add description so that steps form a valid readable test case in the end.
Please add a blank line before when/then to keep the style similar to other tests
Bad name. Why if mention "single-switch"? It must be something like sendSwitchStatusUpdateNotification, the receiver can treat this notification in any required way.
Agree, although there's a precedent with sending "flow reroute" request instead of "ISL status update" notification - just check the method above.

Incorrect pattern usage. Each make*Tuple method serve corresponding stream. These methods make abstraction over stream fields set, that's why they are bound to streams. So if you push message into reroute stream, you must use makeRerouteTuple(...).
Why not a transaction over all flows not over each of them?
Since we need to have consistent state within flow/flow_path, not all flow/flow_paths on the switch, and it also reduce time for each transaction
